description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the heap buffer overflow vulnerability (CVE-2024-0223) in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based), ensure that you are running the latest version of the browser:

1. Open Microsoft Edge.
2. Click on the three dots (...) in the top-right corner.
3. Navigate to 'Help and feedback' > 'About Microsoft Edge' to check for updates.
4. If an update is available, follow the prompts to install the latest version, which resolves this vulnerability.

**Details**:
- The latest version addressing this issue is Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 120.0.2210.121, released on January 5, 2024.
- Always ensure your browser is up to date to maintain the best security posture.
- For more information on Google Chrome releases, see: [Google Chrome Releases](https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2023).
